sentences.en: Ability to work independently and as part of a multi - disciplinary team.
sentences.cn: 既能独立工作,同时也是多元化专业团队的一部分.

sentences.en: Candidates will be considered fraud disciplinary punishment notice signed.
sentences.cn: 违纪舞弊考生必须在处罚通知单上签名.

sentences.en: Dave : Will there be any disciplinary action against any of the players?
sentences.cn: 戴福: 争吵的球员会不会受到纪律处分?

sentences.en: Environmental accounting is the bi - disciplinary subject of environmental economics and accounting.
sentences.cn: 环境会计是环境经济学和会计学的边缘学科.

sentences.en: Failure to comply with the following rules will result in disciplinary action.
sentences.cn: 如果不遵守以下的条规,将会采取纪律行动.

sentences.en: He has promised drastic disciplinary action if they do not mend their ways.
sentences.cn: 如果他们不改邪归正的话，他保证一定严惩不贷。

sentences.en: He was dismissed by way of disciplinary punishment.
He went before the disciplinary committee and had a really rough ride.
sentences.cn: 他在纪律委员会上受到了严厉的批评.

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: Kirby is a creative producer who focuses on contemporary, cross - disciplinary artistic practice.
sentences.cn: 柯西门是一位创意策划人,关注当代 、 跨界的艺术实践.

sentences.en: Tacitus expressly states that the actual disciplinary authority in the army lay with the priests.
sentences.cn: 至于军队的实际惩戒权,塔西佗确定地说,是握在祭司们手里的.

sentences.en: The Appeal Tribunal has reversed the Disciplinary Committee's decision on the licensee.
sentences.cn: 上诉审裁小组已推翻纪律委员会对该持牌人所作的裁决.

sentences.en: The exercise of disciplinary power is a corrective function of the employer.
sentences.cn: 执行纪律的权力乃是资方的一种纠正职能.

sentences.en: The soldiers were ordered to appear before a disciplinary council on charges of negligence.
sentences.cn: 士兵们被控玩忽职守，被勒令接受纪律委员会的审查。

sentences.en: We all have to disciplinary action according to law.
sentences.cn: 我们必须根据校规施予纪律行动.

words.tran_cn: 遵守纪律的；受过训练的
厉行纪律的人；严格的人
使有纪律（discipline的过去分词）；训导

trans.tran_en: Disciplinary bodies or actions are concerned with making sure that people obey rules or regulations and that they are punished if they do not
